questions.question: What is remote work security?
options: A. Practices and policies for securing office buildings
B. Practices, policies, and technologies implemented to ensure security and privacy when working remotely
C. The process of creating data backups
D. The process of sharing data with third parties

questions.question: Which of the following is a common security risk associated with remote work?
options: A. Using a virtual private network (VPN)
D. Keeping software and applications up-to-date

questions.question: What is a best practice for ensuring remote work security?
options: A. Using personal devices without any security measures
B. Sharing sensitive information over unsecured channels
C. Implementing secure file-sharing and collaboration tools
D. Ignoring software and application updates

questions.question: What should remote work security policies cover?
options: A. Procedures for sharing personal information publicly
B. Acceptable use of company resources and data handling requirements
C. Guidelines for ignoring security incidents
D. Instructions for disabling security features on personal devices
